definition.S: AWS Key Management Service (KMS) allows you to create and control the encryption keys used to encrypt your data.
Amazon Cognito provides user sign-up, sign-in, and access control to help secure mobile and web apps.
S3 Transfer Acceleration speeds up uploads to Amazon S3 by routing them through Amazon CloudFront's globally distributed edge locations.
AWS SNS Mobile Push allows you to send push notifications to mobile devices via SNS from both iOS and Android platforms.
Amazon ElastiCache is a fully managed, in-memory data store that helps improve application performance by caching frequently accessed data.
Amazon Redshift is a fully managed data warehouse service that allows fast querying and analytics on large datasets.
AWS Secrets Manager helps protect access to your applications, services, and IT resources by managing secrets like API keys and database credentials.
AWS CloudHSM provides hardware-based key storage for cryptographic operations to meet compliance requirements for sensitive data.
Elastic Load Balancer automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets such as EC2 instances.
AWS X-Ray helps with debugging and analyzing microservices-based applications by providing end-to-end request tracing.
AWS Cloud9 is a cloud-based integrated development environment (IDE) that enables you to write, run, and debug code directly in the browser.
AWS Systems Manager provides operational insights, automates common maintenance tasks, and ensures secure management of your AWS resources.
AWS CloudFormation StackSets enables you to create, update, or delete AWS resources across multiple accounts and regions.
AWS Elastic MapReduce (EMR) is a cloud-native big data platform for processing vast amounts of data using open-source tools like Hadoop and Spark.
AWS DataSync is a data transfer service that simplifies and accelerates moving data between on-premises storage and AWS services.
Amazon WorkSpaces is a managed desktop-as-a-service (DaaS) solution that provides secure cloud desktops to users.
Amazon WorkDocs is a fully managed, secure content creation, storage, and collaboration service with file synchronization and sharing.
AWS AppSync is a managed service that simplifies the development of GraphQL APIs by handling real-time updates and data synchronization.
Amazon EventBridge is a serverless event bus that makes it easy to connect applications using data from various sources.
AWS CodeCommit is a fully managed source control service that hosts private Git repositories for version-controlled code.
AWS CodeBuild is a fully managed build service that compiles source code, runs tests, and produces artifacts ready for deployment.
AWS CodeStar is a unified user interface for managing the development process of software applications from start to finish.
AWS X-Ray provides end-to-end tracing of requests made to your AWS services, enabling you to analyze and debug performance bottlenecks.
AWS Batch enables you to efficiently run hundreds to thousands of batch computing jobs on AWS resources.
Amazon RDS Multi-AZ deployments provide high availability for database instances by automatically replicating data across multiple availability zones.
